context: The Estonian word 'kakskümmend' is the cardinal number for 20. It can be used to count quantities, tell time (e.g., minutes past the hour), refer to ordinal position (like paragraph 20), and appears in compound numbers like 26 (kakskümmend kuus). The word has variations including 'kahekümne' (genitive case) and 'kahekümnesse' (illative case).
